mapper.select:
SELECT R.TTL, K.SKILL, C.CO_NM, get_common(WKSITE) AS WKSITE, R.EXPR_DT, R.CO_IMG, R.RECRUIT_NO, (SELECT S.RECRUIT_NO FROM RECRUIT_SCRAP S WHERE R.RECRUIT_NO = S.RECRUIT_NO AND ID = #{id}) AS scrapYn, F.ID_CO AS followYn
FROM RECRUIT_ANUN R JOIN CO C ON R.ID = C.ID
JOIN (SELECT recruit_no , LISTAGG(get_common(SKILL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SKILL_NO) as SKILL FROM RECRUIT_SKILL GROUP BY recruit_no) K ON R.RECRUIT_NO = K.RECRUIT_NO
LEFT JOIN (SELECT ID_CO FROM FOLLOWING WHERE ID_MEM = #{id}) F ON R.ID = F.ID_CO
WHERE 1=1
AND EXISTS (SELECT S.RECRUIT_NO FROM RECRUIT_SCRAP S WHERE R.RECRUIT_NO = S.RECRUIT_NO AND ID = #{id})
AND R.JOB = #{job}
AND R.WKSITE = #{wksite}
AND R.CARR = #{carr}
AND K.SKILL LIKE '%' || get_common(#{skill}) || '%'
ORDER BY RECRUIT_NO DESC

SELECT R.TTL, K.SKILL, C.CO_NM, get_common(WKSITE) AS WKSITE, R.EXPR_DT, R.CO_IMG, S.RECRUIT_NO,
(SELECT S.RECRUIT_NO FROM RECRUIT_SCRAP S WHERE R.RECRUIT_NO = S.RECRUIT_NO AND ID = #{id}) AS scrapYn
FROM RECRUIT_ANUN R JOIN CO C ON R.ID = C.ID JOIN RECRUIT_SCRAP S ON R.RECRUIT_NO = S.RECRUIT_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON S.ID = M.ID JOIN (SELECT recruit_no , LISTAGG(get_common(SKILL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SKILL_NO) as SKILL FROM RECRUIT_SKILL GROUP BY recruit_no) K ON R.RECRUIT_NO = K.RECRUIT_NO WHERE S.RECRUIT_NO IS NOT NULL AND M.ID = #{id} ORDER BY RECRUIT_NO DESC
SELECT RECRUIT_NO, RECRUIT_IMG FROM RECRUIT_IMAGES WHERE RECRUIT_NO=#{recruitNo}

SELECT K.RECRUIT_NO, R.TTL, get_common(CARR) AS CARR, get_common(JOB) AS JOB, LISTAGG(get_common(SKILL), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SKILL_NO) as SKILL, R.ACCP_DT, C.CO_NM, R.CO_IMG FROM RECRUIT_SKILL K JOIN RECRUIT_ANUN R ON K.RECRUIT_NO = R.RECRUIT_NO JOIN CO C ON C.ID = R.ID WHERE get_common(SKILL) = #{skill} GROUP BY K.RECRUIT_NO, R.TTL, CARR, JOB, R.ACCP_DT, C.CO_NM, R.CO_IMG ORDER BY K.RECRUIT_NO
SELECT RESUME_NO, ID, TTL, REG_DT FROM RESUME WHERE ID = #{id}
